ValidationRule.description: HRIS Integrated Records should be marked as Primary1 when merging records
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"Sales Enablement")), NOT( ISNULL( Bis_ID__c ) ) , LEN( Merge_Name__c )<>0, LOWER(RIGHT( Merge_Name__c, 8))<>"primary1", ISCHANGED( Merge_Name__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: *** This is an HRIS Integrated Record and needs to be marked as Primary1 for merging Purposes ***
